item.title: Learning Emacs Key Bindings
item.description: This post describes my method to learn Emacs native keybindings from an ex-Vimmer’s perspective. It’s an extension from a Reddit post. Evil-mode journey My Emacs journey started with Spacemacs. At that time, I had the misconception that Emacs has lengthy and incomprehensible keybindings, so without a second thought, I chose to go with Vim-bindings, which I used for 6 years and even read a book about. Spacemacs is surely a great project, opening up all the goodies of Emacs to a Vimmer.
